title: TOILETS AT PES RR CAMPUS (HOSTEL)
content:
1. Do we have bucket and mug or we have spray.?

2. How clean it is?

3. Is there western bathrooms?

4. Is there spray for indian

comments.body:
If you staying in NB/NBX you get an attached bathroom with western toilet and jetspray .
If you are staying in IT block you share the bathrooms with the floor and they also have western toilet with jet sprays .
